text: Ðonne þu þæs mannes andetnesse gehyre & he þe his dæda bote axige & þu his lifes gescead wite bide hine þonne ærost for godes lufon & for his ege þæt he his lif mid rihte libbe & his drihtne mid eadmedum hyre & his cristendom & his fulluht wel gehealde & his misdæda andette & his sawle læce georne sece & his fæsten wel bega & his cyrcan clænlice sece & godes beboda georne hlyste & his larþeowa.
& beod him þæt he hine wið ofermetta healde for þam þan men is swiðe mycel þearf þæt he him beorge þæt ofermetta ne forwyrnon his sawle reste.
& ærætas & oferdruncolnys & unrihthæmed & idel gylp & unsibbe & stala & leasunga & mæneaðas & lybblac & ealle þas uncysta forbeod him.

& bide hine & lær hine & cweð him to, Ic þe halsige & beode & hate þæt þu gode ælmihtigum hyrsumige forþan me is neodþearf þæt ic þe riht lære & þe is neodþearf þæt þu riht do & þæt þe næfre deofol beswican.

Ne mote þæt þu læte ænige synne ungeandet þæra þe þu geworht hæbbe ne seo heo naðer ne to þon mycel ne eft to þon lytel ne þe næfre ne þince to hefig ne to þam uneaðelic ne to þam fullic to secganne þæt þu his læte æfre ænig þing ungeandet.

& geþenc þæt þu ænne nacodne lichaman on þas woruld brohtest & þu hine scealt eft ana lætan buton þu hwæt for Godes naman to gode gedo þa hwile þe god þe þisses lifes & þisses forð gewitendlican geunnan wylle.

& geþenc þæt þe is seo tid swiðe uncuð & se dæg þe þu scealt þas lænan woruld forlætan & to godes dome gelæded beon & þonne mid þinre anre sawle riht ægyldan ealra þinga gehwylces þæs þu ær mid þinum lichaman on þinum life gefremodest.
Þonne ne bið nan riht þæs þe þu æfre gedydest godes oððe yfeles godes ælmihtiges eagum bemiðen.
